p: In previous applications of this approach to integrated assessment models (Manne and Richels 1992; Mori et al. 2013), the uncertainty was eliminated by hypothetical processes. Herein, we investigate the impact of knowledge accumulation on the policies adopted for energy technology. We apply the learning process of Fig.Â 1 to an integrated assessment scheme named the Multiregional Approach for Resource and Industry Allocation (MARIA) (Mori et al. 2013). We also analyze the economic benefits of the knowledge accumulation.
